definition: A process of profound change or transformation, often associated with a significant shift in appearance, form, or nature. It is commonly used to describe a metamorphosis or a radical alteration in someone or something, typically involving a complete and noticeable transformation.

examples.german: Die Verwandlung des Schmetterlings ist faszinierend.
examples.english: The transformation of the butterfly is fascinating.

examples.german: Die Verwandlung des Märchensprinzen in einen Frosch war unerwartet.
examples.english: The transformation of the fairy tale prince into a frog was unexpected.

examples.german: Die Verwandlung des Raumes in ein gemütliches Wohnzimmer war gelungen.
examples.english: The transformation of the room into a cozy living room was successful.

examples.german: Die Verwandlung des alten Gebäudes in ein modernes Bürogebäude dauerte mehrere Monate.
examples.english: The transformation of the old building into a modern office building took several months.

examples.german: Die Verwandlung des jungen Mannes vom schüchternen zum selbstbewussten Menschen war beeindruckend.
examples.english: The transformation of the young man from shy to confident was impressive.
